gobblin.metrics

Class RootMetricContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
      • gobblin.metrics.MetricContext
        • gobblin.metrics.RootMetricContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Metric, MetricSet, ReportableContext, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class RootMetricContext
extends MetricContext
    Special singleton MetricContext used as the root of the MetricContext tree. This is the only MetricContext that is allowed to not have a parent. Any MetricContext that does not explicitly have a parent will automatically become a child of the RootMetricContext.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gobblin.metrics.MetricContext
